July il, 1958
Mr* Don Nelson
Radio-TV Supervisor
University of Connecticut
Storrs, ConnecUcut
Dear Mr* Nelson;
Thank you for your letter of June 30* We have received the master
tapes of STRETCHING YOUR FAMILY INCOME*
The offer of free reprints will be made at the conclusion of each
larogram, the listens to be directed to address his request to the
address you mentioned*
We will keep you intomed as to the offering and number of orders
received for this series*
Thank you again for your help*
Sincerely,
Robert E* Underwood* jr*
Network Manager
